Database¶

rixarag uses chromadb. This module adds wrapper functions to interact with chroma.

Documentation¶

class rixarag.database.GPUEmbeddings(model, normalize_embeddings: bool = True)¶

SentenceTransformer with automatic choice of GPU or CPU

_abc_impl = <_abc._abc_data object>¶
_is_protocol = False¶
class rixarag.database.RagDB(*args, **kwargs)¶

Singleton class to manage the RagDB client and SentenceTransformer embedding function

_instance = None¶
rixarag.database.add_processed_chunks(processed_chunks, collection_name)¶

Add processed chunks to the ChromaDB

Assumes a processed chunk is a dictionary with the following keys: - text: the text of the chunk - metadata: a dictionary with metadata about the chunk

Parameters:

  • processed_chunks – a list of processed chunks

  • collection_name – the name of the collection to add the chunks to

rixarag.database.delete_collection(collection_name)¶

Delete a collection from the ChromaDB. Not reversible!

rixarag.database.get_all_elements(collection_name)¶

Get all elements in a collection

rixarag.database.get_chroma_client()¶

Get the ChromaDB client

rixarag.database.get_element_count(collection_name)¶

Get the number of elements in a collection

rixarag.database.list_collections()¶

List all collections in the db

rixarag.database.purge()¶

Reset the ChromaDB. Not reversible!

rixarag.database.query(query: str, collection_name='default', n_results: int = 5, kwargs: Dict[str, Any] = {})¶

Query the ChromaDB

Parameters:

  • query – the query string

  • collection_name – the name of the collection to query

  • n_results – the number of results to return

  • kwargs – additional keyword arguments to pass to the query function of chromadb
